text: Ndipo, ndithudi, tidawapanga iwo kukhala amphamvu zoposa zanu. Ndipo Ife tidawapatsa makutu, maso ndi mitima koma palibe china chilichonse chimene makutu awo, maso awo ndi mitima yawo idawathandiza chifukwa iwo adakana kumvera chivumbulutso cha Mulungu ndipo icho chimene anali kuchinyoza chidawapeza iwo
